### getBlockletMetaFromUrl

#### Arguments

- **input**, optional, null

#### Result Format

```graphql
{
  getBlockletMetaFromUrl {
    code
    inStore
    isFree
    registryUrl
    meta {
      bundleDid
      bundleName
      community
      description
      did
      documentation
      group
      homepage
      keywords
      lastPublishedAt
      logo
      main
      name
      navigation
      nftFactory
      path
      price
      screenshots
      support
      title
      version
      author {
        email
        name
        url
      }
      capabilities {
        clusterMode
        component
        navigation
      }
      components {
        mountPoint
        name
      }
      contributors {
        email
        name
        url
      }
      dist {
        integrity
        tarball
      }
      environments {
        default
        description
        name
        required
        secure
        shared
        validation
      }
      interfaces {
        name
        path
        port
        prefix
        protocol
        type
        services {
          config
          name
        }
      }
      maintainers {
        email
        name
        url
      }
      payment {
        price {
          address
          symbol
          value
        }
        share {
          address
          name
          value
        }
      }
      repository {
        type
        url
      }
      requirements {
        cpu
        os
        server
        fuels {
          address
          endpoint
          reason
          value
        }
      }
      stats {
        downloads
        purchases
        star
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### getBlockletByBundle

#### Arguments

- **input**, optional, null

#### Result Format

```graphql
{
  getBlockletByBundle {
    blockletDid
    code
    isExternal
    isInstalled
    isRunning
  }
}
```

### getBlockletDiff

#### Arguments

- **input**, optional, null

#### Result Format

```graphql
{
  getBlockletDiff {
    code
    blockletDiff {
      addSet
      changeSet
      deleteSet
      hasBlocklet
      version
    }
  }
}
```

```graphql
mutation {
  endSession {
    code
    session
  }
}
```
